Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @IsRead NVARCHAR(4000) SELECT @IsRead = count(IsRead) FROM dbo.SubjRead sr WHERE sr.SubjID = @SubjectID AND sr.UserID = @UserID AND sr.IsRead=0 RETURN Case When @IsRead >0 Then 0 Else 1 End END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN --建立暫存資料表Temp，以便於最後對公司使用量總計Update Create Table #Temp ( CompID Uniqueidentifier Not Null, CTDate Smalldatetime, SubjCT Int, SubjReplyCT Int, StorageCT Int, StaffCT Int )
----建立暫存資料表Company --Create Table #Company --( -- CompID Uniqueidentifier Not Null --)
-- --找出IsActive = 1者，並存入暫存資料表Company，以供之後方便查詢 -- Insert Into #Company -- ( -- CompID -- ) Select CompID into #Company From Company --Join Register reg on com.[Owner] = reg.UserID Where IsActive = 1--reg.invitedFrom = 'bmca' And com.IsActive = 1
--為上面所找出的公司統計當天的發文數、回覆數、以及使用量並寫回至資料表CompUsingD 每日小計，以及暫存資料表Temp
Insert Into #Temp ( CompID, CTDate, SubjCT, SubjReplyCT, StorageCT, StaffCT ) Select cList.CompID, Convert(varchar(10), GetDate()-1, 111) CTDate, isNull(subCt.Subject_Count, 0) SubjectCT, isNull(replyCt.Reply_Count, 0) SubjReplyCT, isNull(storeCt.orderFileSize, 0) StorageCT, StaffCT.UserCount From #Company cList left join ( --主題數量來源 Select CompID, Count(SubjID) Subject_Count From [Subject] Where DateDiff(d, CreatedOn,GetDate()) = 1 And IsActive = 1 Group By CompID ) subCt on cList.CompID = subCt.CompID Left Join ( --回覆數量來源 Select CompID, Count(reply.ReplyID) Reply_Count From [Subject] sub Join SubjReply reply On sub.SubjID = reply.SubjID Where DateDiff(d, reply.CreatedOn,GetDate()) = 1 and reply.IsActive = 1 Group By CompID ) replyCt On cList.CompID = replyCt.CompID Left Join ( --使用容量來源，目前單位為Bytes Select CompID, Sum(Case When CharIndex('M',FileSize)>0 Then Replace(FileSize,'M','')*1000*1000 WHEN CharIndex('K',FileSize)>0 THEN Replace(FileSize,'K','')*1000 ELSE Replace(FileSize,'Bytes','') END) orderFileSize From Attachment Where DateDiff(d, CreatedOn,GetDate()) = 1 and IsActive = 1 Group By CompID ) storeCt On cList.CompID = storeCt.CompID Left Join ( Select Count(u.UserID) as UserCount, CompID From CompUser u where u.isActive = 1 Group by CompID ) StaffCT on cList.CompID = StaffCT.CompID
Insert Into CompUsingD ( CompID, CTDate, SubjCT, SubjReplyCT, StorageCT ) Select CompID, CTDate, SubjCT, SubjReplyCT, StorageCT From #Temp
--Update CompUsingM 公司使用量總計，數字從temp資料表之中取出與目前值加總 Update CompUsingM Set PostCT =(PostCT + temp.SubjCT + temp.SubjReplyCT), StorageCT = (CompUsingM.StorageCT + temp.StorageCT), StaffCT = temp.StaffCT From #Temp temp Where temp.CompID = CompUsingM.CompID
Drop Table #Company Drop Table #Temp END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: begin delete from SubjRead where SubjID in (select SubjID from dbo.Subject where CompID = @CompID ) delete from SubjReply where SubjID in (select SubjID from Subject where CompID = @CompID ) DELETE dbo.MyBox WHERE CompID = @CompID delete from SysLog where CompID = @CompID delete from dbo.Subject where CompID = @CompID delete from Attachment where CompID = @CompID delete from dbo.DiscFileD where FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE CompID = @CompID) delete from dbo.DiscFileM where CompID = @CompID delete from dbo.DiscUser where DiscID in (select DiscID from Discussion where CompID = @CompID) delete from dbo.CompUser where CompID = @CompID delete from Discussion where CompID = @CompID delete from Department where CompID = @CompID DELETE dbo.SuccOrder WHERE CompID = @CompID DELETE dbo.CompUsingD WHERE CompID = @CompID DELETE dbo.CompUsingM WHERE CompID = @CompID delete from Company where CompID = @CompID end

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- Declare the return variable here DECLARE @Output VARCHAR(48) DECLARE @Prefix MONEY DECLARE @Suffix VARCHAR(6) DECLARE @Multiplier DECIMAL(38,2) DECLARE @Bytes DECIMAL(38,2)
SELECT @Multiplier = CASE @InputUOM WHEN 'Bytes' THEN 1 WHEN 'Byte' THEN 1 WHEN 'B' THEN 1 WHEN 'Kilobytes' THEN 1024 WHEN 'Kilobyte' THEN 1024 WHEN 'KB' THEN 1024 WHEN 'Megabytes' THEN 1048576 WHEN 'Megabyte' THEN 1048576 WHEN 'MB' THEN 1048576 WHEN 'Gigabytes' THEN 1073741824 WHEN 'Gigabyte' THEN 1073741824 WHEN 'GB' THEN 1073741824 WHEN 'Terabytes' THEN 1099511627776 WHEN 'Terabyte' THEN 1099511627776 WHEN 'TB' THEN 1099511627776 WHEN 'Petabytes' THEN 1125899906842624 WHEN 'Petabyte' THEN 1125899906842624 WHEN 'PB' THEN 1125899906842624 WHEN 'Exabytes' THEN 1152921504606846976 WHEN 'Exabyte' THEN 1152921504606846976 WHEN 'EB' THEN 1152921504606846976 WHEN 'Zettabytes' THEN 1180591620717411303424 WHEN 'Zettabyte' THEN 1180591620717411303424 WHEN 'ZB' THEN 1180591620717411303424 WHEN 'Yottabytes' THEN 1208925819614629174706176 WHEN 'Yottabyte' THEN 1208925819614629174706176 WHEN 'YB' THEN 1208925819614629174706176 WHEN 'Brontobytes' THEN 1237940039285380274899124224 WHEN 'Brontobyte' THEN 1237940039285380274899124224 WHEN 'BB' THEN 1237940039285380274899124224 WHEN 'Geopbytes' THEN 1267650600228229401496703205376 WHEN 'Geopbyte' THEN 1267650600228229401496703205376 END
SELECT @Bytes = @InputNumber*@Multiplier
SELECT @Prefix = CASE WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1024 THEN @Bytes --bytes WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1048576 THEN (@Bytes/1024) --kb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1073741824 THEN (@Bytes/1048576) --mb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1099511627776 THEN (@Bytes/1073741824) --gb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1125899906842624 THEN (@Bytes/1099511627776) --tb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1152921504606846976 THEN (@Bytes/1125899906842624) --pb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1180591620717411303424 THEN (@Bytes/1152921504606846976) --eb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1208925819614629174706176 THEN (@Bytes/1180591620717411303424) --zb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1237940039285380274899124224 THEN (@Bytes/1208925819614629174706176) --yb WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1267650600228229401496703205376 THEN (@Bytes/1237940039285380274899124224) --bb ELSE (@Bytes/1267650600228229401496703205376) --geopbytes END, @Suffix = CASE WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1024 THEN ' Bytes' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1048576 THEN ' KB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1073741824 THEN ' MB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1099511627776 THEN ' GB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1125899906842624 THEN ' TB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1152921504606846976 THEN ' PB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1180591620717411303424 THEN ' EB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1208925819614629174706176 THEN ' ZB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1237940039285380274899124224 THEN ' YB' WHEN ABS(@Bytes) < 1267650600228229401496703205376 THEN ' BB' ELSE ' Geopbytes' END
-- Return the result of the function SELECT @Output = CAST(@Prefix AS VARCHAR(39)) + @Suffix RETURN @Output
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: -- ============================================= -- Author: Cesar -- Create date: 11/11/2014 -- Modified: -- Description: Format bytes as largest unit (KB, MB, GB, TB, PB, EB, ZB, YB, BB, Geopbytes) -- Will take any unit of measurement as input (bytes, -- KB, MB, GB, TB, PB, EB, ZB, YB, BB, Geopbytes) and converts them first to -- bytes, then formats that as the largest whole UOM in -- a human readable format. 1024MB becomes 1.00GB, 0.5GB -- becomes 512MB, etc. -- INPUT: @InputNumber - Decimal(38,2) -- ============================================= Create FUNCTION [dbo].[f_FSizeView] ( @InputNumber DECIMAL(38,7), @InputUOM VARCHAR(5) = 'Bytes' ) RETURNS VARCHAR(20) WITH SCHEMABINDING AS

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: WITH cUser AS ( SELECT CompID, UserID, LastName + FirstName uName FROM CompUser WHERE (compID = @CompID OR userid = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5') --AND isActive = 1 ) SELECT s.SubjID, u.uName AS CreatorName, s.DiscID, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title , d.DiscName, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, d.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE mu.uName END AS ModifierName, au.uName AS ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.CompID, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, d.isPublic, s.ClosedOn, s.CloseDays, s.ClosedBy, s.PlanDiff, sURL FROM dbo.Subject AS s Left JOIN cUser AS u ON u.UserID = s.CreatedBy LEFT OUTER JOIN cUser AS mu ON s.ModifiedBy = mu.UserID INNER JOIN dbo.Discussion AS d ON d.DiscID = s.DiscID LEFT OUTER JOIN cUser AS au ON s.ApplyCloseBy = au.UserID WHERE s.CompID = @CompID

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: WITH cUser AS ( SELECT CompUser.CompID, CompUser.UserID, LastName + FirstName uName FROM CompUser join DiscUser on CompUser.UserID = DiscUser.UserID WHERE (DiscUser.DiscID = @DiscId OR CompUser.userid = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5') --AND isActive = 1 ) SELECT s.SubjID, u.uName AS CreatorName, s.DiscID, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end + case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title, d.DiscName, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, d.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE mu.uName END AS ModifierName, au.uName AS ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.CompID, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, d.isPublic, s.ClosedOn, s.CloseDays, s.ClosedBy, s.PlanDiff, sURL FROM dbo.Subject AS s Left JOIN cUser AS u ON u.UserID = s.CreatedBy LEFT OUTER JOIN cUser AS mu ON s.ModifiedBy = mu.UserID INNER JOIN dbo.Discussion AS d ON d.DiscID = s.DiscID LEFT OUTER JOIN cUser AS au ON s.ApplyCloseBy = au.UserID WHERE s.DiscID = @DiscId

Declare @Boss as tinyint Declare @DiscCount as tinyint Declare @SubjID as UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @pubDiscID AS uniqueidentifier Declare @CreateOn as SMALLDATETIME
--公開型討論組 SELECT TOP 1 @pubDiscID = DiscID FROM dbo.Discussion WHERE CompID = @CompID AND DiscID = @CompID AND isPublic = 1 AND DiscType < 100
--没有預設的公司公告，就 Return IF (@pubDiscID IS NULL) RETURN
select @SubjID = NEWID(), @CreateOn = SYSUTCDATETIME() -- 格林威治時間 Taipei- 8 SYSUTCDATETIME() --客服人員 UserID '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5' Declare @UserName as nvarchar(50) select @UserName = (FirstName + LastName ) from [dbo].[CompUser] where UserID = @UserID insert [Subject] (SubjID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CompID, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress) values( @SubjID, @CompID, --DiscID, TypeID, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, @UserName + @Title,-- Title @sContent,-- sContent 0, --TypeID, @CreateOn, --CreatedOn @UserID, --CreatedBy, @CompID, --CompID @CreateOn, --ModifiedOn @UserID, --ModifiedBy 0, --ReplyCount 1, --isActive 9 --Progress )
insert SubjRead(SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) values( newid(), @SubjID, @UserId, --ReplyTo Null, --ReplyID 0, --isRead Null --ReadTime )
Insert MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) values(@UserId, @SubjID, @CompID, @CompID, 0, 1, Null, @UserID)
Update Discussion set SubjCT = isNull(b.SubjCT, 0) from (select count(*) SubjCT from [Subject] where DiscID = @CompID and IsActive = 1 and Progress < 9 ) b where Discussion.DiscID = @CompID
-- Did trigger User was Boss? --select @Boss = COUNT(*) --from dbo.CompUser --where CompID = @CompID AND UserID = @UserID AND isBoss = 1
----Did he create administration of discussion yet? --if(@Boss = 1) --BEGIN -- select @DiscCount = COUNT(*) -- from Discussion -- where CompID = @CompID and DiscType > 100 --END --ELSE -- select @DiscCount = 1
--if(@DiscCount = 0) --BEGIN -- declare @BossUID as UNIQUEIDENTIFIER -- select TOP 1 @BossUID = UserID from CompUser where CompID = @CompID AND isBoss = 1 -- --新增 討論組 -- insert Discussion (DiscID, Serial, DiscName, DiscNotice, DiscType, CompID, isPublic, SubjCT, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, IsActive, HtmlForm)
-- select newID(), -- Serial, DiscName, DiscNotice, DiscType, -- @CompID CompID, --'新公司ID' -- isPublic, 0 SubjCT, getDate() CreatedOn, CreatedBy, Null ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, IsActive, HtmlForm -- from [Discussion] -- where CompID = 'C3374540-86E1-40EB-B1BA-152E1B9E6B03' --立穩為資料模板匯入 -- and DiscType > 100
-- --新增討論組的 最高權限者 -- insert [dbo].[DiscUser] ( UserID, DiscID, PowerID, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, DefaultReceiver, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy) -- select @BossUID, DiscID, -- 3 PowerID, getdate() CreatedOn, @BossUID CreatedBy,'1' DefaultReceiver, -- null ModifiedOn, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ModifiedBy -- from [Discussion] -- where discID in (select DiscID from Discussion where CompID = @CompID and DiscType > 100) -- and discID not in (select discID from dbo.DiscUser where CompID = @CompID and PowerID = 3) --end

BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @reader NVARCHAR(4000) SELECT @reader = ISNULL(@reader + ';', '') + cu.LastName + cu.FirstName + '&'+ u.loginEmail +'&'+ CONVERT(nvarchar(50), u.UserID) FROM dbo.SubjRead sr INNER JOIN dbo.[Subject] s ON sr.SubjID = s.SubjID INNER JOIN dbo.[UserInfo] u ON sr.UserID = u.UserID INNER JOIN dbo.[CompUser] cu ON s.CompID = cu.CompID WHERE sr.SubjID = @SubjectID Group By cu.LastName ,cu.FirstName,u.loginEmail,cu.UserID RETURN @reader END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
select @Action = Lower(@Action)
--IniData 快取用 IF @UserID IS NULL BEGIN SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible , s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId END ELSE IF(@Action ='newsnumber') --取得未讀數字 BEGIN SELECT count(*) NewsNumber from MyBox where UserID = @UserID and isRead = 0 AND CompID = @CompID END ELSE IF (@Action ='mybox') -- MyBox 取得我的信箱 BEGIN
SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible, s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId WHERE a.UserID = @UserID AND a.CompID = @CompID
END ELSE IF (@Action ='myboxbyd') -- MyBox 取得我的信箱 依討論組 BEGIN
SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, s.Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible, s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByDiscId(@DiscID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId WHERE a.DiscID = @DiscID END ELSE --取得未讀資料, 包含今日開啟紀錄 BEGIN
select '0' as 'DataType', CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible, s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId WHERE a.UserID = @UserID AND isRead = 0 AND a.CompID = @CompID --AND Progress <> 2
UNION
--開啟紀錄 select '1' as 'DataType', CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible , s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId join Company on Company.CompID =@CompID WHERE a.UserID = @UserID AND isRead = 1 and convert(char(19), DateAdd(Hour,cast(Company.TimeZone as int), ReadTime), 112) = convert(char(19), DATEADD(HOUR,cast(Company.TimeZone as int),GETUTCDATE()), 112) AND Progress <> 2 AND a.CompID = @CompID
UNION
select '2' as 'DataType', CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible , s.sURL FROM dbo.MyBox a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId WHERE a.UserID = @UserID AND Progress = 2 AND a.CompID = @CompID
END

-- --SubjColor
-- UPDATE #result SET SubjColor = b.Color -- FROM dbo.UserColor b -- WHERE #result.UserID = b.UserID AND #result.SubjID = b.SubjId
-- --INSERT #result (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) -- --SELECT 0 IsFav, Color SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 isRead, 0 Visible, NULL ReadTime, s.CreatedBy -- --FROM dbo.UserColor a JOIN dbo.Subject s ON s.SubjID = a.SubjID -- -- LEFT JOIN #result r ON a.SubjID = r.SubjID AND a.UserID = r.UserID -- --WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL
-- INSERT #result (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible) -- SELECT 0 IsFav, Color SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, s.DiscName, s.Title, s.CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, s.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, s.ModifiedBy, s.ModifierName, s.ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, s.isPublic, 1 isRead, NULL ReadTime, 0 Visible -- FROM dbo.UserColor a JOIN f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.subjid = s.subjID -- LEFT JOIN #result r ON a.SubjID = r.SubjID AND a.UserID = r.UserID -- WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL
-- select * from #result -- DROP TABLE #result --END ----@Subj 所有關聯的 User --else IF (@SubjID IS NOT NULL) begin IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#ans') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #ans DECLARE @CompID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @CompID = CompID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
SELECT 0 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, a.userid, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic, ISNULL(m.isRead, 1) isRead, m.ReadTime, ISNULL(m.Visible, 0) Visible INTO #ans FROM (SELECT UserID, SubjID FROM dbo.SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID GROUP BY UserID, SubjID) a join f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN dbo.MyBox m ON a.UserID = m.UserID AND a.SubjID = m.SubjID
-- isFav UPDATE #ans SET IsFav = case when b.SubjID is null then 0 else 1 end FROM dbo.UserFavorite b WHERE #ans.UserID = b.UserID AND #ans.SubjID = b.SubjID and b.SubjID = @SubjID
INSERT #ans (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible) SELECT 1 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, s.DiscName, s.Title, s.CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, s.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, s.ModifiedBy, s.ModifierName, s.ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, s.isPublic, 1 isRead, NULL ReadTime, ISNULL(m.Visible, 0) Visible FROM dbo.UserFavorite a JOIN f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID left join MyBox m on m.SubjID = a.SubjID and a.UserID = m.UserID LEFT JOIN #ans r ON a.SubjID = r.SubjID AND a.UserID = r.UserID WHERE a.SubjID = @SubjID AND r.SubjID IS NULL
--SubjColor
UPDATE #ans SET SubjColor = b.Color FROM dbo.UserColor b WHERE #ans.UserID = b.UserId AND #ans.SubjID = b.SubjId and b.SubjId = @SubjID
INSERT #ans (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, DiscName, Title,CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible) SELECT 0 IsFav, Color SubjColor, a.UserId, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, s.DiscName, s.Title, s.CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, s.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, s.ModifiedBy, s.ModifierName, s.ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, s.isPublic, 1 isRead, NULL ReadTime, 0 Visible FROM dbo.UserColor a JOIN f_Subj_ByCompID(@CompID) s on a.SubjId = s.SubjID LEFT JOIN #ans r ON a.SubjId = r.SubjID AND a.UserId = r.UserID WHERE a.SubjId = @SubjID AND r.SubjID IS NULL
select * from #ans DROP TABLE #ans end

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE procedure [dbo].[spGet_BoxUsers] --@UserID uniqueidentifier, @SubjID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER -- iniData -- SubjUser as

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
--年月 IF @sDate IS NULL BEGIN DECLARE @lastMonth AS DATETIME SELECT @lastMonth = DATEADD(month, -1, SYSUTCDATETIME()) SELECT @sDate = CONVERT( DATETIME, CAST(Year(@lastMonth) AS VARCHAR(4)) + '/' + CAST(MONTH(@lastMonth) AS VARCHAR(2)) + '/01'), @eDate = SYSUTCDATETIME() END
declare @flag bit = 1 --【勤益開發組】中的【問題回報】 if(@CompID ='02CB2458-4851-4437-9556-6DE3408FEE9C' and @DiscID='B908B406-F693-4D5F-939B-0648F56C64B8') BEGIN
--select [dbo].[IsSubjectFavorite](SubjectId,@UserID) AS IsSubjectFavorite, --isnull([dbo].[GetSubjectColor] (SubjectId,@UserID), 0) AS SubjectColor, --dbo.CheckSubjectRead(subjectid,@UserID) 'IsRead',* --from SubjectClosedView --where DiscID = @DiscID AND IsActive=1 --以 #Read 模擬 MyBox with Usr as ( select UserID, CompID, LastName + FirstName uName from CompUser where CompID = @CompID or UserID = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5' --客服人員 --and isActive = 1 ), sRead as ( SELECT r.SubjID, UserID, IsRead from dbo.SubjRead r where UserID = @UserID and IsRead = 0 and SubjID in (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate) )
SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, isnull(isRead, 1) isRead, @UserID userid, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, --Title, u1.uName as CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE u2.uName END AS ModifierName, u3.uName ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, s.ClosedOn, u4.uName CloserName ,s.CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, s.PlanDiff, s.IsActive, isPublic,
@eDate ReadTime, -- 隨便給 @eDate 只是避免 Null 1 Visible, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20),s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title FROM dbo.Subject s LEFT JOIN sRead ON s.SubjID = sRead.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[UserFavorite] WHERE UserID = @UserID) f ON s.SubjID = f.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM dbo.UserColor WHERE UserId = @UserID) c ON s.SubjID = c.SubjId join Discussion d on s.DiscID = d.DiscID left join Usr u1 on s.CreatedBy = u1.UserID left join Usr u2 on s.ModifiedBy = u2.UserID left join Usr u3 on s.ApplyCloseBy = u3.UserID left join Usr u4 on s.ClosedBy = u4.UserID WHERE s.DiscID = @DiscID AND s.ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate ORDER BY s.ClosedOn DESC
End else BEGIN
--判斷公開，私密 --IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.Discussion WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND isPublic = 1) IF @flag=1 BEGIN --公開 show 全部 Subject with Usr as ( select UserID, CompID, LastName + FirstName uName from CompUser where CompID = @CompID or UserID = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5' --客服人員 --and isActive = 1 ), sRead as ( SELECT r.SubjID, UserID, IsRead from dbo.SubjRead r where UserID = @UserID and IsRead = 0 and SubjID in (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate) group by r.SubjID, UserID, IsRead )
SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, isnull(isRead, 1) isRead, @UserID userid, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, --Title, u1.uName as CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE u2.uName END AS ModifierName, u3.uName ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, s.ClosedOn, u4.uName CloserName ,s.CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, s.PlanDiff, s.IsActive, isPublic, @eDate ReadTime, -- 隨便給 @eDate 只是避免 Null 1 Visible, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20),s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title FROM dbo.Subject s LEFT JOIN sRead ON s.SubjID = sRead.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM [dbo].[UserFavorite] WHERE UserID = @UserID) f ON s.SubjID = f.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM dbo.UserColor WHERE UserId = @UserID) c ON s.SubjID = c.SubjId join Discussion d on s.DiscID = d.DiscID left join Usr u1 on s.CreatedBy = u1.UserID left join Usr u2 on s.ModifiedBy = u2.UserID left join Usr u3 on s.ApplyCloseBy = u3.UserID left join Usr u4 on s.ClosedBy = u4.UserID WHERE s.DiscID = @DiscID and s.ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate AND s.Progress >= 9 ORDER BY s.ClosedOn DESC
END ELSE BEGIN --私密 以 SubjRead 為判斷基準 with Usr as ( select UserID, CompID, LastName + FirstName uName from CompUser where CompID = @CompID or UserID = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5' --客服人員 --and isActive = 1 ), sRead as ( SELECT r.SubjID, UserID, IsRead from dbo.SubjRead r where UserID = @UserID and SubjID in (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate) group by r.SubjID, UserID, IsRead )
SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, CASE WHEN ReadCT > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isRead, @UserID userid, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, --Title, u1.uName as CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE u2.uName END AS ModifierName, u3.uName ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, s.ClosedOn, u4.uName CloserName ,s.CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, s.PlanDiff, s.IsActive, isPublic, @eDate ReadTime, -- 隨便給 @eDate 只是避免 Null 1 Visible , (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20),s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title FROM dbo.Subject s JOIN (SELECT SubjID, SUM(CAST(IsRead AS INT)) ReadCT FROM sRead group by SubjID) sRead ON s.SubjID = sRead.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT SubjID FROM [dbo].[UserFavorite] WHERE UserID = @UserID) f ON s.SubjID = f.SubjID LEFT JOIN (SELECT SubjId, Color FROM dbo.UserColor WHERE UserId = @UserID) c ON s.SubjID = c.SubjId join Discussion d on s.DiscID = d.DiscID left join Usr u1 on s.CreatedBy = u1.UserID left join Usr u2 on s.ModifiedBy = u2.UserID left join Usr u3 on s.ApplyCloseBy = u3.UserID left join Usr u4 on s.ClosedBy = u4.UserID WHERE s.DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress >= 9 and s.IsActive = 1 AND s.ClosedOn BETWEEN @sDate AND @eDate ORDER BY s.ClosedOn DESC END End

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
if @UserID is null begin SELECT 0 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, m.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, m.startDay, m.endDay, m.isRead , Visible, m.ReadTime, s.CreatedBy INTO #result FROM dbo.Subject s JOIN dbo.MyBox m ON m.SubjID = s.SubjID
-- isFav UPDATE #result SET IsFav = case when b.SubjID is null then 0 else 1 end FROM dbo.UserFavorite b WHERE #result.UserID = b.UserID AND #result.SubjID = b.SubjID
INSERT #result (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT 1 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 isRead, 0 Visible, NULL ReadTime, s.CreatedBy FROM dbo.UserFavorite a JOIN dbo.Subject s ON s.SubjID = a.SubjID LEFT JOIN #result r ON a.SubjID = r.SubjID AND a.UserID = r.UserID WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL
--SubjColor
UPDATE #result SET SubjColor = b.Color FROM dbo.UserColor b WHERE #result.UserID = b.UserId AND #result.SubjID = b.SubjId
INSERT #result (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT 0 IsFav, Color SubjColor, a.UserId, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 isRead, 0 Visible, NULL ReadTime, s.CreatedBy FROM dbo.UserColor a JOIN dbo.Subject s ON s.SubjID = a.SubjId LEFT JOIN #result r ON a.SubjId = r.SubjID AND a.UserId = r.UserID WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL
select * from #result end else begin if exists(select * from [sys].[tables] where [name] = '#ans') drop table #ans SELECT 0 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, m.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, m.startDay, m.endDay, m.isRead , Visible, m.ReadTime, s.CreatedBy INTO #ans FROM dbo.Subject s left join (select * from MyBox where UserID = @UserID) m on s.SubjID = m.SubjID where s.SubjID = @SubjID
-- isFav UPDATE #ans SET IsFav = case when b.SubjID is null then 0 else 1 end FROM dbo.UserFavorite b WHERE #ans.UserID = b.UserID AND #ans.SubjID = b.SubjID and b.SubjID = @SubjID
INSERT #ans (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT 1 IsFav, 0 SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 isRead, 0 Visible, NULL ReadTime, s.CreatedBy FROM dbo.UserFavorite a JOIN dbo.Subject s ON s.SubjID = a.SubjID LEFT JOIN #ans r ON a.SubjID = r.SubjID AND a.UserID = r.UserID WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL and a.SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjColor
UPDATE #ans SET SubjColor = b.Color FROM dbo.UserColor b WHERE #ans.UserID = b.UserId AND #ans.SubjID = b.SubjId and b.SubjId = @SubjID
INSERT #ans (IsFav, SubjColor, UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, isRead, Visible, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT 0 IsFav, Color SubjColor, a.UserId, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 isRead, 0 Visible, NULL ReadTime, s.CreatedBy FROM dbo.UserColor a JOIN dbo.Subject s ON s.SubjID = a.SubjId LEFT JOIN #ans r ON a.SubjId = r.SubjID AND a.UserId = r.UserID WHERE r.SubjID IS NULL and a.SubjId = @SubjID
select * from #ans end

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: IF @UserID IS NULL BEGIN SELECT *, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) else '' end ) + a.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), a.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 FROM dbo.v_Subj a WHERE a.IsActive = 1 and Progress < 9 END ELSE BEGIN SELECT a.* , (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) else '' end ) + a.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), a.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 FROM dbo.v_Subj a JOIN dbo.MyBox b ON b.SubjID = a.SubjID WHERE b.UserID = @UserID AND a.IsActive = 1 and Progress < 9 END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT *, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = a.CusTagId) else '' end ) + a.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), a.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 FROM dbo.v_Subj a WHERE a.isActive = 1 and Progress < 9 and a.DiscID = @DiscId RETURN 0

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
IF @UserID IS NULL BEGIN with Usr as ( select UserID, CompID, LastName + FirstName uName from CompUser where isActive = 1 )
SELECT s.*, u.uName AS CreatorName, Re.uName ReUserName, --CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE mu.uName END AS ModifierName, isNull(au.uName, '') AS ApplyerName , (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 FROM v_Draft AS s INNER JOIN Usr AS u ON u.UserID = s.CreatedBy --right outer join (select r.ReplyID, u.uName from subjReply r join Usr u on r.CreatedBy = u.UserID) as Re on Re.ReplyID = s.ReplyID LEFT OUTER JOIN (select r.ReplyID, uName from SubjReply r join Draft s on r.SubjID = s.SubjID join Usr u on r.CreatedBy = u.UserID) as Re on s.ReplyID = Re.ReplyID LEFT OUTER JOIN Usr AS mu ON s.ModifiedBy = mu.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN Usr AS au ON s.ApplyCloseBy = au.UserID END ELSE BEGIN with Usr as ( select UserID, @CompID CompID, LastName + FirstName uName from CompUser where CompID = @CompID or UserID = '5CAA1316-E5CD-4AD8-A9BF-800D4E9212B5' --客服人員 --and isActive = 1 ), draftbyUser as ( select * from v_Draft where DraftCreatedBy = @UserID )
SELECT s.*, u.uName AS CreatorName, isnull(Re.uName, '') ReUserName, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE mu.uName END AS ModifierName, isNull(au.uName, '') AS ApplyerName , (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =@CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 FROM draftbyUser AS s JOIN Usr AS u ON u.UserID = s.CreatedBy LEFT OUTER JOIN (select r.ReplyID, uName from SubjReply r join draftbyUser s on r.SubjID = s.SubjID left join Usr u on r.CreatedBy = u.UserID) as Re on s.ReplyID = Re.ReplyID LEFT OUTER JOIN Usr AS mu ON s.ModifiedBy = mu.UserID LEFT OUTER JOIN Usr AS au ON s.ApplyCloseBy = au.UserID END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT 1 IsFav, case when (a.SubjID is NOT NULL AND a.Visible = 1) then 1 else 0 end Visible, case when c.SubjId is null then 0 else Color end SubjColor, --a.SubjID, a.CompID, a.DiscID, isnull(a.isRead , 1) as isRead, s.* ,a.ReadTime,a.UserID, (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20),s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title2 from (select * from dbo.UserFavorite where UserID = @UserID) f LEFT JOIN MyBox a ON f.UserID = a.UserID AND f.SubjID = a.SubjID Left join [dbo].[UserColor] c on f.UserID = c.UserId and f.SubjID = c.SubjId JOIN v_Subj s ON s.SubjID = f.SubjID

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN DECLARE @sql as nvarchar(2000), @SearchString varchar(100) SET @SearchString = 'FormsOf(INFLECTIONAL, "' + @KeyWord + '")' IF OBJECT_ID(N'tempdb..#TempTable') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE #TempTable CREATE TABLE #TempTable ( Serial [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, SubjID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, AttID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, DiscID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, DiscName NVARCHAR(50), DataSource INT, -- 1 訊息, 2 檔案 finish BIT, DiscType int )
--建立 User 可使用討論組 臨時表 CREATE TABLE #Discussion ( DiscID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, DiscName NVARCHAR(50), DiscType int )
--討論組過濾 IF (len(@DiscID) > 0) BEGIN --討論組有指定 SET @sql = N' INSERT INTO #DiscussiON ( DiscID, DiscName, DiscType) SELECT a.DiscID, DiscName, d.DiscType from DiscUser a join Discussion d on a.DiscID = d.DiscID WHERE UserID =''' + @UserID + N''' AND d.IsActive = 1 AND a.DiscID in (' + @DiscID +N')' EXECUTE sp_executesql @sql END ELSE BEGIN -- User 能進入討論組 INSERT INTO #Discussion ( DiscID, DiscName, DiscType) SELECT a.DiscID, DiscName, b.DiscType FROM dbo.DiscUser a JOIN dbo.Discussion b ON a.DiscID = b.DiscID WHERE a.CompID = @CompID and UserID = @UserID and b.IsActive = 1 END
--串接搜尋字串 Declare @s1 as NVarchar(1000)
-- dataSource : 1 訊息, 2 檔案 -- finish : 0 未完成 , 1完成 --完成日期 IF (@isFinish is Not Null) BEGIN IF(@isFinish = 1) SELECT @s1 = ' (S.isActive = 0 AND Progress >=9) ' --完成 ELSE SELECT @s1 = ' (S.isActive = 1 AND Progress < 9) ' --進行中 END ELSE BEGIN--@SearchType 0 全部 1.訊息 2.檔案 IF(@SearchType = 0 or @SearchType = 1) SELECT @s1 = ' (1=1)'--' (S.isActive = 1) ' --進行中 與 完成 都顯示 ELSE -- 2 搜尋檔案 SELECT @s1='((S.IsActive = 1) or (S.IsActive IS NULL) or (S.isActive = 0 AND Progress >=9))' END
--日期區間 IF( @sDay is not NULL AND @eDay IS NOT NULL) SET @s1 = CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN @s1 +' AND ' ELSE '' END +' s.CreatedOn Between Cast('''+ @sDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) AND Cast('''+ @eDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) ' ELSE IF @sDay IS NOT NULL SET @s1 = CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN @s1 +' AND ' ELSE '' END + ' s.CreatedOn >= Cast('''+ @sDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) ' ELSE IF @eDay IS NOT NULL SET @s1 = CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN @s1 +' AND ' ELSE '' END + ' s.CreatedOn <= Cast('''+ @eDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) '
IF (@CreatedBy is not null) --指定發信人 IF(@SearchType = 1) SET @s1 = CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN @s1 +' AND ' ELSE '' END + ' s.CreatedBy in ('+ @CreatedBy +')' ELSE --檔案搜尋 SET @s1 = CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN @s1 +' AND ' ELSE '' END + ' s.CreatedBy in ('+ @CreatedBy +') '
--print 's1 = '+case when @s1 is not null then @s1 else '' end --print 'ss = '+case when @ss is not null then @ss else '' end --Subject
IF (@SearchType = 0 or @SearchType = 1) --訊息搜尋 BEGIN -- dataSource : -- 1 訊息, 2 檔案 -- finish : --未完成 0, 1完成 SELECT @sql = N'INSERT INTO #TempTable ( SubjID, AttID, DiscID, DiscName, DataSource, finish, DiscType ) SELECT S.SubjID, NULL, S.DiscID, DiscName, 1 datASource, 0 finish, DiscType FROM #DiscussiON D inner join dbo.Search_Content S1 on S1.DiscId= D.DiscID and S1.sContent like ''%'+ @KeyWord + N'%'' INNER JOIN dbo.Subject S ON D.DiscID = S.DiscID and S1.SubjID = S.SubjID '+ CASE WHEN @s1 is not null THEN 'where ' + @s1 ELSE '' END EXECUTE sp_executesql @sql --PRINT @sql END
IF (@SearchType = 2) BEGIN --檔案搜尋 DECLARE @f1 AS VARCHAR(2000) --檔案專用過濾 IF( @sDay is not NULL AND @eDay IS NOT NULL) SET @f1 = ' and f.CreatedOn Between Cast('''+ @sDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) AND Cast('''+ @eDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) ' ELSE IF @sDay IS NOT NULL SET @f1 = ' and f.CreatedOn >= Cast('''+ @sDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) ' ELSE IF @eDay IS NOT NULL SET @f1 = ' and f.CreatedOn <= Cast('''+ @eDay +''' AS SmallDateTime) '
IF (@CreatedBy is not null) --指定發信人 SET @f1 = ' and f.CreatedBy in ('+ @CreatedBy +') '
IF (@s1 IS NULL) SELECT @s1 = '' ELSE SELECT @s1 = ' AND ' + @s1
IF (@f1 IS NULL) SELECT @f1 = ''
SELECT @sql = N' ;WITH comUser as ( SELECT c.userid, u.LastName + u.FirstName uName FROM CompUser c join userinfo u ON c.UserID = u.UserID WHERE u.CompID = '''+ CAST(@CompID AS VARCHAR(36)) + N''' Group By c.userid, u.LastName + u.FirstName )
select 2 AS SearchType, ''Att'' DataSrc, d.DiscName, d.DiscID, Att.AttID, 1 Version, Att.[FileName], Att.FilePath, Att.FileType, FileSize, Att.FileSizeView, Att.CreatedOn, Att.CreatedBy, c.uName UserName, Att.SubjID, Att.Skey, Att.Okey, Att.Mkey, d.DiscType ,(case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+''-'' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '''''' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =a.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+''-'' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '''''' end ) + s.Title +''-''+ convert(varchar(20), DateAdd(Hour,cast(Company.TimeZone as int), s.CreatedOn), 111) as Title from #Discussion d join Attachment att on d.DiscID = att.DiscID join dbo.Subject s on att.SubjID = s.SubjID join comUser c on att.CreatedBy = c.UserID left join Company on Company.CompID =s.CompID where att.FileName like ''%'+ @KeyWord + N'%'' and att.IsActive = 1 ' + @s1 + N' union select 2 AS SearchType, ''DiscFile'' DataSrc, d.DiscName, ''FileShare'', d.DiscID, f.FileID, f.Version, f.[FileName], NULL FilePath, f.FileType, FileSize, f.FileSizeView, f.CreatedOn, f.CreatedBy, c.uName UserName, null SubjID, f.Skey, f.Okey, f.Mkey, d.DiscType from #Discussion d join DiscFileM f on d.DiscID = f.DiscID join comUser c on f.CreatedBy = c.UserID where f.FileName like ''%'+ @KeyWord + N'%'' ' + @f1 --and IsActive = 1 EXECUTE sp_executesql @sql
END ELSE BEGIN --訊息搜尋 --WITH sRead as --( -- Select SubjID, UserID, IsRead, ReplyID -- from dbo.SubjRead -- where UserID = @UserID --), ;WITH coUser as ( SELECT u.UserID, c.LastName + c.FirstName + '&'+ u.loginEmail +'&'+ CONVERT(varchar(40), u.UserID) userLabel FROM CompUser c join UserInfo u ON c.UserID = u.UserID WHERE c.CompID = @CompID Group By c.LastName ,c.FirstName,u.loginEmail,c.UserID )
SELECT TOP 500 1 AS SearchType, CASE WHEN a.SubjID is null THEN 0 else 1 END isIns, CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, ( SELECT userLabel +',' FROM SubjRead sr JOIN coUser u ON sr.UserID = u.UserID WHERE sr.SubjID = t1.SubjID Group By userLabel for xml path('') ) Reader, @userID UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, t1.DiscName, CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, t1.DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic, CASE WHEN a.isRead IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE isRead END isRead, a.ReadTime,a.Visible ,(case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), DateAdd(Hour,cast(Company.TimeZone as int), s.CreatedOn), 111) as Title FROM #TempTable t1 JOIN v_Subj s ON t1.SubjID = s.SubjID left join dbo.MyBox a on t1.SubjID = a.SubjID AND a.UserID = @UserID LEFT JOIN UserFavorite f ON t1.SubjID = f.SubjID AND f.UserID = @UserID LEFT JOIN UserColor c ON t1.SubjID = c.SubjId AND c.UserId = @UserID left join Company on Company.CompID =@CompID ORDER BY s.CreatedOn desc END
TRUNCATE TABLE #Discussion DROP TABLE #Discussion END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
-- Insert statements for procedure here SELECT CASE WHEN f.SubjID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END isFav, CASE WHEN c.Color IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.Color END SubjColor, a.UserID, s.SubjID, s.CompID, s.DiscID, DiscName, CreatorName, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, ReplyCount, Progress, DiscType, OrderPrice, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ModifierName, ApplyerName, ApplyCloseOn, PlanCloseOn, IsActive, ApplyCloseBy, isPublic,a.isRead,a.ReadTime,a.Visible ,(case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.SubjTagId) else '' end ) + (case when (select count(1) from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) >0 then (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName+' - ' from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.CompanyID =s.CompID and SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s.CusTagId) else '' end ) + s.Title +' - '+ convert(varchar(20), s.CreatedOn, 111) as Title FROM dbo.MyBox a join v_Subj s on a.SubjID = s.SubjID and a.SubjID = @SubjectId LEFT JOIN [dbo].[UserFavorite] f ON a.SubjID = f.SubjID AND a.UserID = f.UserID LEFT JOIN dbo.UserColor c ON a.UserID = c.UserId AND a.SubjID = c.SubjId WHERE a.UserID = @UserID END

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @actDate DATETIME SELECT @actDate = SYSUTCDATETIME() -- 格林威治時間 Taipei- 8 SYSUTCDATETIME()
DECLARE @compID AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @DiscID = DiscID, @compID = CompID FROM dbo.Discussion WHERE DiscID = @DiscID
select @Action = LOWER(@Action) BEGIN TRY if @Action = 'deletefolder' --刪除 BEGIN SELECT @LogID = NEWID() ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Delete' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileFolder', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--遞迴 ;WITH pFolder(FolderID, DiscID, FolderName, parentFolderID, fLevel) as ( SELECT FolderID, DiscID, FolderName, parentFolderID , 0 AS fLevel FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @FID
UNION ALL
-- Recursive SELECT a.FolderID, a.DiscID, a.FolderName, a.parentFolderID, fLevel + 1 FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder a JOIN pFolder b ON a.DiscID = b.DiscID AND a.parentFolderID = b.FolderID WHERE a.DiscID = @DiscID AND a.FolderID <> @FID ) SELECT * INTO #pFolder FROM pFolder
--M INSERT dbo.Trash_DiscFileM(LogID, FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT @LogID , FileID, b.Version, b.CompID, b.DiscID, b.FolderID, b.FileName, b.Intro, b.FileSize, b.FileSizeView, b.FileType, b.sURL, b.CreatedBy, b.CreatedOn, b.is2Cloud, b.Skey, b.Okey, b.Mkey FROM #pFolder a JOIN dbo.DiscFileM b ON a.FolderID = b.FolderID WHERE b.DiscID = @FID
--D INSERT Trash_DiscFileD (LogID, FileID, Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT @LogID, b.FileID, b.Version, b.FileName, b.Intro, b.FileSize, b.FileSizeView, b.FileType, b.CreatedBy, b.CreatedOn, b.is2Cloud, b.Skey, b.Okey, b.Mkey FROM #pFolder a JOIN (SELECT b.FolderID, b.DiscID, a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.DiscID = @FID ) b ON a.FolderID = b.FolderID
--Folder INSERT dbo.Trash_DiscFileFolder(LogID, FolderID, CompID, DiscID, FileCT, FolderName, parentFolderID, sURL, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy) SELECT @LogID, b.FolderID, b.CompID, b.DiscID, b.FileCT, b.FolderName, b.parentFolderID, b.sURL, b.CreatedOn, b.CreatedBy, b.ClosedOn, b.ClosedBy FROM #pFolder a JOIN dbo.DiscFileFolder b ON a.FolderID = b.FolderID WHERE b.FolderID = @FID AND b.DiscID = @DiscID
--delete Data DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder WHERE FolderID IN (SELECT FolderID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileFolder WHERE LogID = @LogID)
--更新資料夾中的統計數量 DECLARE @parentFolder AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @parentFolder = parentFolderID FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder WHERE FolderID = @FID UPDATE dbo.DiscFileFolder SET FileCT = ISNULL(b.fileCT , 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) fileCT FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @parentFolder) b WHERE dbo.DiscFileFolder.FolderID = @parentFolder
End ELSE IF @Action = 'deletem' -- 刪除 M BEGIN SELECT @LogID = NEWID() ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Delete' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileM', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--M INSERT dbo.Trash_DiscFileM(LogID, FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT @LogID LogID, FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey FROM DiscFileM WHERE FileID = @FID
--D INSERT dbo.Trash_DiscFileD(LogID, FileID, Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT @LogID LogID, a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.FileID = @FID
--delete Data DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE LogID = @LogID)
--更新資料夾中的統計數量 DECLARE @Folder AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @Folder = FolderID FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE FileID = @Fid
UPDATE dbo.DiscFileFolder SET FileCT = b.fileCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) fileCT FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @Folder) b WHERE dbo.DiscFileFolder.FolderID = @Folder
End else if (@Action = 'deleted') -- BEGIN SELECT @LogID = NEWID() ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Delete' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileD', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--D INSERT dbo.Trash_DiscFileD(LogID, FileID, a.Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT @LogID LogID, a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.FileID = @FID AND a.Version = @Version
--砍掉的是最新版 MAX(Version) = @version --IF ( -- (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(Version) v FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID = @FID GROUP BY FileID) -- = @version THEN '1' ELSE '0' END -- ) = '1' -- )
BEGIN DECLARE @v AS SMALLINT = 0 SELECT @v = MAX(a.Version)FROM dbo.DiscFileD a WHERE a.Version <> @version AND FileID = @FID IF (@v IS NOT NULL AND @v <> 0) --如果還有其他版本 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.DiscFileM SET Version = b.Version , FileName = b.FileName, Intro = b.Intro, FileSize = b.FileSize, FileSizeView = b.FileSizeView, FileType = b.FileType, CreatedBy = b.CreatedBy, CreatedOn = b.CreatedOn, is2Cloud = b.is2Cloud, Skey = b.Skey, Mkey = b.Mkey, Okey = b.Okey FROM (SELECT * FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID = @FID AND Version = @v)b WHERE DiscFileM.FileID = b.FileID END END --delete Data DELETE FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID = (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID) AND DiscFileD.Version = (SELECT Version FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID) END ELSE IF @Action = 'restorefolder' --還原Folder BEGIN
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Restore' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileFolder', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--遞迴 ;WITH pFolder(FolderID, DiscID, FolderName, parentFolderID, fLevel) as ( SELECT FolderID, DiscID, FolderName, parentFolderID , 0 AS fLevel FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @FID
UNION ALL
-- Recursive SELECT a.FolderID, a.DiscID, a.FolderName, a.parentFolderID, fLevel + 1 FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder a JOIN pFolder b ON a.DiscID = b.DiscID AND a.parentFolderID = b.FolderID WHERE a.DiscID = @DiscID AND a.FolderID <> @FID ) SELECT * INTO #bFolder FROM pFolder
--M INSERT dbo.DiscFileM(FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT FileID, b.Version, b.CompID, b.DiscID, b.FolderID, b.FileName, b.Intro, b.FileSize, b.FileSizeView, b.FileType, b.sURL, b.CreatedBy, b.CreatedOn, b.is2Cloud, b.Skey, b.Okey, b.Mkey FROM #bFolder a JOIN dbo.Trash_DiscFileM b ON a.FolderID = b.FolderID WHERE b.DiscID = @DiscID AND b.LogID = @LogID
--D INSERT DiscFileD ( FileID, Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT b.FileID, b.Version, b.FileName, b.Intro, b.FileSize, b.FileSizeView, b.FileType, b.CreatedBy, b.CreatedOn, b.is2Cloud, b.Skey, b.Okey, b.Mkey FROM #bFolder a JOIN (SELECT b.FolderID, b.DiscID, a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.Trash_DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.DiscID = @DiscID AND a.LogID = @LogID ) b ON a.FolderID = b.FolderID
--Folder INSERT dbo.DiscFileFolder( FolderID, CompID, DiscID, FileCT, FolderName, parentFolderID, sURL, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy) SELECT FolderID, CompID, DiscID, FileCT, FolderName, parentFolderID, sURL, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileFolder WHERE FolderID = @FID AND LogID = @LogID
--delete Data DELETE FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileFolder WHERE FolderID IN (SELECT FolderID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileFolder WHERE LogID = @LogID)
--更新資料夾中的統計數量 DECLARE @parentID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @parentID = parentFolderID FROM dbo.DiscFileFolder WHERE FolderID = @Fid
UPDATE dbo.DiscFileFolder SET FileCT = ISNULL(b.fileCT , 0) FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) fileCT FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @parentID) b WHERE dbo.DiscFileFolder.FolderID = @Folder
END ELSE IF @Action = 'restorem' BEGIN
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Restore' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileM', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--D INSERT dbo.DiscFileD(FileID, Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.Trash_DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.FolderID = @FID AND a.LogID = @LogID
--M INSERT dbo.DiscFileM(FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT FileID, Version, CompID, DiscID, FolderID, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, sURL, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey FROM Trash_DiscFileM WHERE FolderID = @FID AND LogID = @LogID
--更新資料夾中的統計數量 DECLARE @Folder1 AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @Folder1 = FolderID FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE FileID = @Fid
UPDATE dbo.DiscFileFolder SET FileCT = b.fileCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) fileCT FROM dbo.DiscFileM WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND FolderID = @Folder1) b WHERE dbo.DiscFileFolder.FolderID = @Folder1
--delete Data DELETE FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileM WHERE LogID = @LogID) DELETE FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE FileID IN (SELECT FileID FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD WHERE LogID = @LogID)
END ELSE IF @Action = 'restored' BEGIN
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@LogID, 'Restore' --SqlVerb , 'DiscFileD', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '' , @actDate , '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'')
--D INSERT dbo.DiscFileD(FileID, Version, FileName, Intro, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, Skey, Okey, Mkey) SELECT a.FileID, a.Version, a.FileName, a.Intro, a.FileSize, a.FileSizeView, a.FileType, a.CreatedBy, a.CreatedOn, a.is2Cloud, a.Skey, a.Okey, a.Mkey FROM dbo.Trash_DiscFileD a JOIN dbo.Trash_DiscFileM b ON a.FileID = b.FileID WHERE b.FolderID = @FID AND a.LogID = @LogID AND a.Version = @Version
--還原的是最新版 MAX(Version) = @Version IF ( (SELECT CASE WHEN (SELECT MAX(Version) v FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID = @FID GROUP BY FileID) = @version THEN '1' ELSE '0' END ) = '1' ) BEGIN UPDATE dbo.DiscFileM SET Version = b.Version , FileName = b.FileName, Intro = b.Intro, FileSize = b.FileSize, FileSizeView = b.FileSizeView, FileType = b.FileType, CreatedBy = b.CreatedBy, CreatedOn = b.CreatedOn, is2Cloud = b.is2Cloud, Skey = b.Skey, Mkey = b.Mkey, Okey = b.Okey FROM (SELECT * FROM dbo.DiscFileD WHERE FileID = @FID AND Version = @version)b WHERE DiscFileM.FileID = b.FileID AND DiscFileM.Version = b.Version END END
--公司用量總計 UPDATE dbo.CompUsingM SET StorageCT = b.StorageCT FROM ( SELECT z.CompID, SUM(fs) StorageCT FROM ( SELECT CompID, b.FileSize fs FROM dbo.DiscFileM a JOIN dbo.DiscFileD b ON b.FileID = a.FileID WHERE CompID = @compID UNION SELECT CompID, FileSize fs FROM dbo.Attachment WHERE CompID = @CompID )z GROUP BY z.CompID )b WHERE dbo.CompUsingM.CompID = b.CompID
END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS ErrorNumber ,ERROR_LINE() AS ErrorLine ,ERROR_MESSAGE() AS ErrorMessage; IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION; END CATCH;
IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 COMMIT TRANSACTION; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN BEGIN TRY DECLARE @actDate DATETIME SELECT @actDate = SYSUTCDATETIME() -- 格林威治時間 Taipei- 8 SYSUTCDATETIME()
SELECT @Action = LOWER(@Action)
IF @Action = 'delete' BEGIN --SubjReply insert Trash_SubjReply(ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) select ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive from SubjReply where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) delete from SubjReply where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) --SubjRead insert Trash_SubjRead(SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) select SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime from SubjRead where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) delete from SubjRead where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) --Attachment insert Trash_Attachment(AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) select AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height from Attachment where DiscID = @DiscID delete Attachment where DiscID = @DiscID --UserFavorite insert Trash_UserFavorite(FavID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn) select FavID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn from UserFavorite where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) DELETE dbo.UserFavorite where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) --UserColor Insert Trash_UserColor(ColorID, UserId, SubjId, Color) select * from UserColor where SubjId IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) DELETE dbo.UserColor where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) --MyBox DELETE dbo.MyBox WHERE DiscID = @DiscID
--刪除 Subject , 搬到 Trash insert Trash_Subject(SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress) select SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress from Subject where DiscID = @DiscID delete from Subject where DiscID = @DiscID
--DiscUser 只剩老闆 DELETE [dbo].[DiscUser] WHERE DiscID = @discid AND PowerID = 3
--Discussion UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET IsActive = 0 WHERE DiscID = @DiscID
---- Search_Content ----- delete from Search_Content where DiscId = @DiscID -- 避免删除的 Subj 被搜尋到
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Delete' --SqlVerb , 'Discussion', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', Null, NULL, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' ,'') END ELSE BEGIN --還原 Discussion UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET IsActive = 1 WHERE DiscID = @DiscID
insert Subject(SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress) select SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress from Trash_Subject where DiscID = @DiscID delete from Trash_Subject where DiscID = @DiscID --SubjReply insert SubjReply(ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) select ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive from Trash_SubjReply where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) delete from Trash_SubjReply where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) --SubjRead insert SubjRead(SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) select SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime from Trash_SubjRead where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) delete from Trash_SubjRead where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID)
--Attachment insert Attachment(AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) select AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height from Trash_Attachment where DiscID = @DiscID delete Trash_Attachment where DiscID = @DiscID
--UserFavorite insert UserFavorite(FavID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn) select FavID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn from Trash_UserFavorite WHERE SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) DELETE Trash_UserFavorite WHERE SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID)
--UserColor Insert dbo.UserColor(ColorID, UserId, SubjId, Color) select Trash_UserColor.ColorID,Trash_UserColor.UserId,Trash_UserColor.SubjId,Trash_UserColor.Color from Trash_UserColor where SubjId IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) DELETE Trash_UserColor WHERE SubjId IN (SELECT dbo.Subject.SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID)
--MyBox 處理 --新增本次回覆增加的收件人 INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, IsRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (select SubjID, UserID, case when sum(cast(IsRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end IsRead from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID IN (SELECT SubjID FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID) GROUP BY SubjID, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = a.SubjID
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Restore' --SqlVerb , 'Discussion', @CompID, @DiscID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', '' , '', @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' , '')
------ Search_Content ------ insert Search_Content(CompID, DiscId, SubjID, sContent, Attachment) select @CompID, @DiscID, s1.SubjID, title +' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) +' ' + ( select ' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) from [SubjReply] as s2 where s2.SubjID = s1.SubjID FOR XML PATH('') ) as sContent, ( select [FileName] + ',' from Attachment att where att.SubjID = s1.SubjID and IsActive = 1 FOR XML PATH('') )Attachment from Subject s1 where s1.DiscID = @DiscID END END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS ErrorNumber ,ERROR_LINE() AS ErrorLine ,ERROR_MESSAGE() AS ErrorMessage; IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION; END CATCH;
IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 COMMIT TRANSACTION; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @actDate DATETIME SELECT @actDate = SYSUTCDATETIME() -- 格林威治時間 Taipei- 8 SYSUTCDATETIME() DECLARE @CompID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @DiscID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER DECLARE @Title NVARCHAR(100) DECLARE @sContent NVARCHAR(max) DECLARE @PlanCloseOn smalldatetime DECLARE @AttListId varchar(MAX) DECLARE @DiscType AS INT IF @ReplyID IS NULL BEGIN SELECT @AttListId = ( select cast(AttID as varchar(36))+',' from Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' FOR XML PATH('') ) END
SELECT @CompID = CompID, @DiscID = DiscID, @Title = Title, @sContent = sContent, @PlanCloseOn = PlanCloseOn FROM dbo.Subject WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
select @Action = LOWER(@Action) --PRINT @Action + ' one ' BEGIN TRY if @Action = 'apply' -- 申請歸檔 BEGIN update Subject set Progress = 2, ApplyCloseBy = @UserID, ApplyCloseOn = @actDate where SubjID = @SubjID --通知 update MyBox set isRead = 0 , ReadTime = null from (select top 1 * from DiscUser where DiscID = @DiscID and PowerID > 1 order by PowerID)b -- 依照權限值排序 2, 3 取一個 where MyBox.UserID = b.UserID and MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID --SubjReader update SubjRead set IsRead = 0,ReadTime = null from (select top 1 * from DiscUser where DiscID = @DiscID and PowerID > 1 order by PowerID)b -- 依照權限值排序 2, 3 取一個 where SubjRead.UserID = b.UserID and SubjRead.SubjID = @SubjID and (SubjRead.ReplyID='00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' or SubjRead.ReplyID is null) ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Apply' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn) End ELSE IF @Action = 'cancelapply' -- 取消申請 BEGIN update Subject set Progress = 1, ApplyCloseBy = null, ApplyCloseOn = null where SubjID = @SubjID --還原通知 declare @managerID uniqueidentifier --管理員的ID select top 1 @managerID = UserID from DiscUser where DiscID = @DiscID and PowerID > 1 order by PowerID -- 依照權限值排序 2, 3 取一個 --if exists(select * from SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and UserID = @managerID and IsRead = 0) --管理者原來倒底是已讀還是未讀 --begin --未讀 -- update MyBox set isRead = 0, ReadTime = 0 -- where MyBox.UserID = @managerID and MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID --end --else --begin --已讀 -- update MyBox set isRead = 1 -- where MyBox.UserID = @managerID and MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID --end update MyBox set isRead = 1, ReadTime = GETUTCDATE() where MyBox.UserID = @managerID and MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID update SubjRead set IsRead = 1,ReadTime = GETUTCDATE() where SubjRead.UserID = @managerID and SubjRead.SubjID = @SubjID and (SubjRead.ReplyID='00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' or SubjRead.ReplyID is null) ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'CancelApply' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn) End else if (@Action = 'close' OR (LEFT(@Action, 9) = 'closefail')) -- 歸檔 BEGIN DECLARE @progress AS tinyint = 9 DECLARE @SignSerial AS TINYINT IF (LEFT(@Action, 9) = 'closefail') SELECT @progress = 10, @SignSerial = RIGHT(@Action, 1)
UPDATE dbo.Subject SET Progress = @progress , ClosedBy = @UserID, ClosedOn = @actDate, CloseDays = DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn , convert( char(10), cast(@actDate as smalldatetime), 111)), PlanDiff = case when PlanCloseOn is null then null else DATEDIFF(day, @actDate , PlanCloseOn) end where SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjCT UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET SubjCT = b.SubjCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) SubjCT FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress<9 ) b WHERE Discussion.DiscID = @DiscID
---- 刪除已讀的 MyBox ---- DELETE MyBox WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND isRead = 1
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), @Action --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
--INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) --VALUES (NEWID(), CASE @Action WHEN 'close' THEN 'CloseYes' ELSE 'CloseNo' END --SqlVerb --, 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
END ELSE IF @Action = 'back' --退回 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.Subject SET Progress = 5, ApplyCloseOn = null, ApplyCloseBy = null, IsActive = 1, RejectBy = @UserID, RejectOn = @actDate WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjCT UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET SubjCT = b.SubjCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) SubjCT FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress<9) b WHERE Discussion.DiscID = @DiscID
---- 還原 myBox ---- INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (select SubjID, UserID, case when sum(cast(isRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end isRead from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = @ReplyID group by SubjID, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = @SubjID and UserID not in (select UserID from MyBox where SubjID = @SubjID)
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Back' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
END ELSE IF LEFT(@Action, 9) = 'back2step' BEGIN DECLARE @StepNumber AS TINYINT = RIGHT(@Action, 1) --退回指定的進度
--退回主題 Subject UPDATE dbo.Subject SET Progress = 5, ApplyCloseOn = null, ApplyCloseBy = null, IsActive = 1, RejectBy = @UserID, RejectOn = @actDate WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjCT UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET SubjCT = b.SubjCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) SubjCT FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress<9) b WHERE Discussion.DiscID = @DiscID
-- 指定退回關卡 --UPDATE FlowSign SET YesNo = NULL, CreateOn = NULL WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND Serial > = @StepNumber
DELETE FROM dbo.FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND Serial >= @StepNumber
