INSERT dbo.FlowSign( SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn) SELECT @SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, NULL, NULL FROM dbo.FlowSetting WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Serial >= @StepNumber
---- 還原 myBox ---- INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (select SubjID, UserID, case when sum(cast(isRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end isRead from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = @ReplyID group by SubjID, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = @SubjID and UserID not in (select UserID from MyBox where SubjID = @SubjID)
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Back' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
END ELSE IF LEFT(@Action, 10) = 'reset2step' --進行中的退回 BEGIN DECLARE @StepSerial AS TINYINT = RIGHT(@Action, 1) --退回指定的進度
--指定退回關卡 DELETE FROM dbo.FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND Serial >= @StepSerial INSERT dbo.FlowSign( SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn) SELECT @SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, NULL, NULL FROM dbo.FlowSetting WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Serial >= @StepSerial
---- 還原 myBox ---- INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (select SubjID, UserID, case when sum(cast(isRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end isRead from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = @ReplyID group by SubjID, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = @SubjID and UserID not in (select UserID from MyBox where SubjID = @SubjID)
----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'reset2step' + CAST(@StepSerial AS VARCHAR(5)) --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn) -- SELECT @StepNumber = RIGHT(@Action, 1) --退回指定的進度
----指定退回關卡 --DELETE FROM dbo.FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND Serial >= @StepNumber --INSERT dbo.FlowSign( SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn) --SELECT @SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, NULL, NULL FROM dbo.FlowSetting --WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Serial >= @StepNumber
------ 還原 myBox ---- --INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) -- SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy -- FROM -- (select subjID, UserID, case when sum(cast(isRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end isRead -- from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = @ReplyID group by subjID, UserID) a -- WHERE SubjID = @SubjID and UserID not in (select UserID from MyBox where SubjID = @SubjID)
------- Log ------- --INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) --VALUES (NEWID(), 'reset2step' + CAST(@StepNumber AS VARCHAR(5)) --SqlVerb --, 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
END ELSE IF @Action = 'delete' --刪除 Subject BEGIN ----- Log ------- DECLARE @NewLogID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@NewLogID , 'Delete' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title, @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
-- 搬到 Trash
--刪除 Subject , insert Trash_Subject(LogID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress, sURL) SELECT @NewLogID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress, sURL from Subject where SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjReply insert Trash_SubjReply(LogID, ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) select @NewLogID, ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive from SubjReply where SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjRead insert Trash_SubjRead(LogID, SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) select @NewLogID, SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime from SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID
--Attachment insert Trash_Attachment(LogID, AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) select @NewLogID, AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height from Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID
--UserFavorite insert Trash_UserFavorite(LogID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn) SELECT @NewLogID, UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn from UserFavorite WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
--UserColor Insert Trash_UserColor(LogID, UserId, SubjId, Color) select @NewLogID, UserId, SubjId, Color from UserColor where SubjId = @SubjID DELETE dbo.UserColor WHERE SubjId = @SubjID
SELECT @DiscType = DiscType FROM dbo.Discussion WHERE DiscID = @DiscID --請假、加班、外出 IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ) BEGIN INSERT Trash_FlowWorkTime(LogID, WorkID, SubjID, WrokTypeID, Reason, Agent, sWorkTime, eWorkTime, CtDay, CtTime, Memo, CreateOn, CreateBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy,UserID) SELECT @NewLogID, WorkID, SubjID, WrokTypeID, Reason, Agent, sWorkTime, eWorkTime, CtDay, CtTime, Memo, CreateOn, CreateBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy ,UserID FROM dbo.FlowWorkTime WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
END ELSE IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 200 AND 300) --請款、採購 BEGIN INSERT Trash_FlowDetail(LogID, ItemID, SubjID, Serial, AccTypeID, AccTypeName, ItemName, ItemCount, usingDate, Price, Memo, InvoiceMemo, CreateOn, CreateBy, isActive, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy) SELECT @NewLogID, ItemID, SubjID, Serial, AccTypeID, AccTypeName, ItemName, ItemCount, usingDate, Price, Memo, InvoiceMemo, CreateOn, CreateBy, isActive, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy FROM dbo.FlowDetail WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
INSERT dbo.Trash_FlowSign(LogID, SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn) SELECT @NewLogID, SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn FROM FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID END
--delete DELETE dbo.MyBox WHERE SubjID = @SubjID DELETE dbo.UserFavorite WHERE SubjID = @SubjID delete Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID delete from SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID delete from SubjReply where SubjID = @SubjID IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ) DELETE dbo.FlowWorkTime WHERE SubjID = @SubjID --請假、加班、外出 ELSE IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 200 AND 300) --請款、採購 BEGIN DELETE FlowDetail WHERE SubjID = @SubjID DELETE dbo.FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID END
delete from Subject where SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjCT UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET SubjCT = b.SubjCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(SubjID) SubjCT FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress<9 AND IsActive = 1 GROUP BY SubjID) b WHERE Discussion.DiscID = @DiscID
----Draft------- delete from Draft where SubjID = @SubjID delete from Draft_Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID delete from Draft_SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID ---- Search_Content ----- delete from Search_Content where SubjID = @SubjID -- 避免删除的 Subj 被搜尋到 END ELSE IF @Action = 'restore' --還原 Subject BEGIN ----- Log ------- INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Restore' --SqlVerb , 'Subject', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
--Subject IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.Subject WHERE SubjID = @SubjID) BEGIN UPDATE dbo.Subject SET Title = b.Title, sContent = b.sContent, ModifiedOn = b.ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy = b.ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn = b.SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy = b.SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn = b.ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy = b.ApplyCloseBy, ClosedOn = b.ClosedOn, ClosedBy = b.ClosedBy, PlanCloseOn = b.PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff = b.PlanDiff, RejectOn = b.RejectOn, RejectBy = b.RejectBy, Progress = b.Progress, OrderPrice = b.OrderPrice, CusID = b.CusID, SubjType = b.SubjType, sURL = b.sURL FROM (SELECT * FROM dbo.Trash_Subject WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID )b WHERE dbo.Subject.SubjID = b.SubjID AND LogID = @LogID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT Subject(SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress, sURL) select SubjID, CompID, DiscID, Title, sContent, SubjType, CusID, OrderPrice, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ClosedOn, ClosedBy, CloseDays, PlanCloseOn, PlanDiff, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, SubjModifiedOn, SubjModifiedBy, ApplyCloseOn, ApplyCloseBy, RejectOn, RejectBy, ReplyCount, IsActive, Progress, sURL from Trash_Subject where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID END
--找出 compID --因為 Subject 還原後才有 @CompID SELECT @CompID = CompID, @DiscID = DiscID, @Title = Title, @sContent = sContent, @PlanCloseOn = PlanCloseOn FROM dbo.Subject WHERE SubjID = @SubjID
--SubjReply insert SubjReply(ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) select ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive from Trash_SubjReply where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID
--SubjRead insert SubjRead(SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) select SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime from Trash_SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID --Attachment insert Attachment(AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) select AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height from Trash_Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID delete Trash_Attachment where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID --UserFavorite insert UserFavorite( UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn) select UserID, SubjID, CreatedOn from Trash_UserFavorite WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID --UserColor Insert dbo.UserColor( UserId, SubjId, Color) select UserId, SubjId, Color from Trash_UserColor where SubjId = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID
SELECT @DiscType = DiscType FROM dbo.Discussion WHERE DiscID = @DiscID --請假、加班、外出 IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ) BEGIN INSERT FlowWorkTime( WorkID, SubjID, WrokTypeID, Reason, Agent, sWorkTime, eWorkTime, CtDay, CtTime, Memo, CreateOn, CreateBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy) SELECT WorkID, SubjID, WrokTypeID, Reason, Agent, sWorkTime, eWorkTime, CtDay, CtTime, Memo, CreateOn, CreateBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy FROM dbo.Trash_FlowWorkTime WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID
END ELSE IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 200 AND 300) --請款、採購 BEGIN INSERT Trash_FlowDetail( ItemID, SubjID, Serial, AccTypeID, AccTypeName, ItemName, ItemCount, usingDate, Price, Memo, InvoiceMemo, CreateOn, CreateBy, isActive, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy) SELECT ItemID, SubjID, Serial, AccTypeID, AccTypeName, ItemName, ItemCount, usingDate, Price, Memo, InvoiceMemo, CreateOn, CreateBy, isActive, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy FROM dbo.Trash_FlowDetail WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID
INSERT dbo.Trash_FlowSign( SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn) SELECT SubjID, UserID, Serial, FlowName, YesNo, CreateOn FROM Trash_FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID END
--MyBox 處理 --- 還原未讀的通知 update MyBox set isRead = 0 from (select * from SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and IsRead = 0) b where MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID and MyBox.UserID = b.UserID --新增本次回覆增加的收件人 INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, null ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (select SubjId, UserID, case when sum(cast(isRead as tinyint)) > 0 then 1 else 0 end isRead from dbo.SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID group by SubjId, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = @SubjID and UserID not in (select UserID from MyBox where SubjID = @SubjID)
DELETE Trash_UserFavorite WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID DELETE Trash_UserColor WHERE SubjId = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID delete from Trash_SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID delete from Trash_Subject where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID delete from Trash_SubjReply where SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID --請假、加班、外出 IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ) DELETE dbo.Trash_FlowWorkTime WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID ELSE IF (@DiscType BETWEEN 200 AND 300) --請款、採購 BEGIN DELETE Trash_FlowDetail WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID DELETE Trash_FlowSign WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND LogID = @LogID END
--SubjCT UPDATE dbo.Discussion SET SubjCT = b.SubjCT FROM (SELECT COUNT(SubjID) SubjCT FROM dbo.Subject WHERE DiscID = @DiscID AND Progress<9 AND IsActive = 1 GROUP BY SubjID) b WHERE Discussion.DiscID = @DiscID
------ Search_Content ------ goto Insert_SearchContent
END ELSE IF @Action = 'reply_delete' -- 刪除回覆 Begin ----- Log ------- DECLARE @_LogID AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NEWID() INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (@_LogID, 'Reply_Delete' --SqlVerb , 'SubjectReply', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, isnull(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
insert Trash_SubjRead(LogID, SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) select @_LogID, SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime from SubjRead where SubjID = @SubjID and ReplyID = @ReplyID
--Attachment insert Trash_Attachment(LogID, AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) SELECT @_LogID, AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height FROM Attachment WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID
--刪除 SubjRead , 搬到 Trash_SubjRead INSERT Trash_SubjReply(LogID, ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) SELECT @_LogID, ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive FROM SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID
--取消本次通知 DELETE MyBox WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND UserID NOT IN (SELECT UserID FROM SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID ) --update MyBox set isRead = 1 where UserID = @UserID and SubjID = @SubjID
--還原前次未讀的通知 -- --UPDATE MyBox SET isRead = 0 --FROM (SELECT * FROM SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND IsRead = 0) b --WHERE MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID AND MyBox.UserID = b.UserID -- INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, NULL ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (SELECT SubjID, UserID, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(isRead AS TINYINT)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isRead FROM dbo.SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID GROUP BY SubjID, UserID) a WHERE CAST(a.SubjID AS VARCHAR(36)) + CAST(a.UserID AS VARCHAR(36)) NOT IN (SELECT CAST(a.SubjID AS VARCHAR(36)) + CAST(a.UserID AS VARCHAR(36)) FROM dbo.MyBox WHERE SubjID = @SubjID) --- DELETE SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID DELETE SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID DELETE Attachment WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID
--更新 ReplyCount UPDATE dbo.Subject SET ReplyCount = b.ReplyCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) ReplyCount FROM dbo.SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID ) b WHERE Subject.SubjID = @SubjID
------ Search_Content --------------重新產生 GOTO Update_SearchContent
END ELSE IF @Action = 'reply_restore' --還原回覆 BEGIN ----- Log -------
INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Reply_Restore' --SqlVerb , 'SubjectReply', @CompID, @DiscID, @SubjID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @Title , @sContent, @actDate, '', @UserID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, ISNULL(@AttListId, '') ,@PlanCloseOn)
--SubjReply INSERT SubjReply(ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive) SELECT ReplyID, SubjID, ReplyTo, sContent, CreatedOn, CreatedBy, ModifiedOn, ModifiedBy, ReplyToArea, IsActive FROM Trash_SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID
--SubjRead INSERT SubjRead(SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime) SELECT SubjReadID, SubjID, UserID, ReplyID, IsRead, ReadTime FROM Trash_SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID
--Attachment INSERT Attachment(AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height) SELECT AttID, CompID, DiscID, SubjID, ReplyID, FileName, FilePath, FileSize, FileSizeView, FileType, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, is2Cloud, IsActive, IsEmbed, Skey, Okey, Mkey, width, height FROM Trash_Attachment WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID
--MyBox 處理 --- 還原未讀的通知 UPDATE MyBox SET isRead = 0 FROM (SELECT * FROM SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND IsRead = 0) b WHERE MyBox.SubjID = @SubjID AND MyBox.UserID = b.UserID --新增本次回覆增加的收件人 INSERT dbo.MyBox(UserID, SubjID, CompID, DiscID, startDay, endDay, Visible, isRead, ReadTime, CreatedBy) SELECT UserID, SubjID, @CompID, @DiscID, NULL startDay, NULL endDay, 1 Visible, isRead, NULL ReadTime, @UserID CreatedBy FROM (SELECT SubjID, UserID, CASE WHEN SUM(CAST(isRead AS TINYINT)) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END isRead FROM dbo.SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID GROUP BY SubjID, UserID) a WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND UserID NOT IN (SELECT UserID FROM MyBox WHERE SubjID = @SubjID)
DELETE FROM Trash_SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID DELETE FROM Trash_SubjRead WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID DELETE Trash_Attachment WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND ReplyID = @ReplyID AND logID = @_LogID
--更新 ReplyCount UPDATE dbo.Subject SET ReplyCount = b.ReplyCount FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) ReplyCount FROM dbo.SubjReply WHERE SubjID = @SubjID AND IsActive=1) b WHERE Subject.SubjID = @SubjID
------ Search_Content --------------重新產生 goto Update_SearchContent
End
-- CancelApply 取消申請歸檔 -- Close 歸檔 -- CloseFail 流程失敗的歸檔 -- Back 退回 -- Back2Step -- Delete 刪除Subject -- Restore 還原刪除Subject -- Reply_delete 刪除回復 -- Reply_restore 還原回復 ------ Search_Content -------Begin insert_SearchContent: IF (@Action = 'restore') BEGIN insert Search_Content(CompID, DiscId, SubjID, sContent) select @CompID, @DiscID, s1.SubjID, (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s1.SubjTagId)+'-'+(select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s1.CusTagId)+'-'+ Title +' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) +' ' + ISNULL(( select ' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) from [SubjReply] as s2 where s2.SubjID = s1.SubjID FOR XML PATH('') ),'') as sContent from Subject s1 where subjid = @SubjID END Update_SearchContent: update Search_Content set sContent = b.sContent from ( select s1.SubjID, (select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s1.SubjTagId)+'-'+(select SubjectTag.SubjTagIdName from SubjectTag where SubjectTag.SubjTagId = s1.CusTagId)+'-'+ Title +' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) +' ' + ISNULL(( select ' ' + dbo.TrimHTML(sContent) from [SubjReply] as s2 where s2.SubjID = s1.SubjID FOR XML PATH('') ),'') as sContent from Subject s1 where subjid = @SubjID ) b where Search_Content.SubjID = @SubjID ------ Search_Content ------- End
END TRY BEGIN CATCH SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS ErrorNumber ,ERROR_LINE() AS ErrorLine ,ERROR_MESSAGE() AS ErrorMessage; IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 ROLLBACK TRANSACTION; END CATCH;
IF @@TRANCOUNT > 0 COMMIT TRANSACTION; END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value:
BEGIN -- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from -- interfering with SELECT statements. SET NOCOUNT ON; --使用者是否為簽核人員
IF @Action = 9 BEGIN UPDATE dbo.CompUser SET isActive = 9 WHERE UserID = @UserID AND CompID = @CompID DECLARE @DepID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER SELECT @DepID = DepID FROM dbo.CompUser WHERE UserID = @UserID AND CompID = @CompID INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Delete' --SqlVerb DiscID TargetID1 TargetID1 , 'CompUser', @CompID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @DepID , @UserID, '' , '', SYSUTCDATETIME(), -- title , subject, LogTime (格林威治時間 Taipei- 8) '', @BossID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' , '')
END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE dbo.CompUser SET isActive = 1 WHERE UserID = @UserID AND CompID = @CompID DECLARE @DepID1 UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = @CompID IF EXISTS(SELECT a.DepID FROM dbo.CompUser a JOIN dbo.Department b ON b.DepID = a.DepID AND b.CompID = a.CompID WHERE UserID = @UserID AND a.CompID = @CompID) SELECT @DepID1 = DepID FROM dbo.CompUser WHERE UserID = @UserID AND CompID = @CompID
INSERT dbo.SysLog(LogID, SqlVerb, TargetTable, CompID, DiscID, TargetID1, TargetID2, TargetTitle, TargetContent, LogTime, SqlStatement, ByUserID, ByUserDevice, ByUserIP, ByUserBrowser, AttListId, PlanCloseOn) VALUES (NEWID(), 'Restore' --SqlVerb DiscID TargetID1 TargetID1 , 'CompUser', @CompID, '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000', @DepID1 , @UserID, '' , '', SYSUTCDATETIME(), -- title , subject, LogTime (格林威治時間 Taipei- 8) '', @BossID, @ByUserDevice, @ByUserIP, @ByUserBrowser, '' , '') END
END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @Start INT DECLARE @End INT DECLARE @Length INT SET @Start = CHARINDEX('<',@HTMLText) SET @End = CHARINDEX('>',@HTMLText,CHARINDEX('<',@HTMLText)) SET @Length = (@End - @Start) + 1 WHILE @Start > 0 AND @End > 0 AND @Length > 0 BEGIN SET @HTMLText = STUFF(@HTMLText,@Start,@Length,'') SET @Start = CHARINDEX('<',@HTMLText) SET @End = CHARINDEX('>',@HTMLText,CHARINDEX('<',@HTMLText)) SET @Length = (@End - @Start) + 1 END select @HTMLText = replace(@HTMLText, ' ', ' ') RETURN LTRIM(RTRIM(@HTMLText)) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[TrimHTML] (@HTMLText VARCHAR(MAX)) RETURNS VARCHAR(MAX) AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT a.CompID, b.ShortName, ds, dbo.f_FSizeView(ds, 'bytes') dataSize FROM ( SELECT CompID , SUM( DATALENGTH(ISNULL(a.sContent, '')) + DATALENGTH(ISNULL(b.sContent, '')) ) ds FROM dbo.Subject a LEFT JOIN dbo.SubjReply b ON a.SubjID = b.SubjID GROUP BY CompID )a JOIN dbo.Company b ON a.CompID = b.CompID ORDER BY ds DESC

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT CASE WHEN TypeId = 0 AND isEdit = 0 THEN '0' WHEN TypeId = 0 AND isEdit = 1 THEN '1' WHEN TypeId = 1 AND isEdit = 0 THEN '2' ELSE '3' END AS DraftType, s.SubjID, s.ReplyID, s.ReReplyID, s.DiscID, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, d.DiscName, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, d.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.CompID, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, d.isPublic, s.DraftCreatedOn, s.DraftCreatedBy, CASE WHEN s.typeid = 1 THEN s1.Title ELSE s.Title END AS Title, s.DraftID, s.SubjTagId, s.CusTagId FROM dbo.Draft AS s INNER JOIN dbo.Discussion AS d ON d.DiscID = s.DiscID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.Subject AS s1 ON s1.SubjID = s.SubjID

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT z.CompID, c.ShortName, dbo.f_FSizeView( SUM(fs), 'bytes' ) fview FROM ( SELECT CompID, b.FileSize fs FROM dbo.DiscFileM a JOIN dbo.DiscFileD b ON b.FileID = a.FileID UNION SELECT CompID, FileSize fs FROM dbo.Attachment )z JOIN dbo.Company c ON z.CompID = c.CompID GROUP BY z.CompID, c.ShortName ORDER BY SUM(fs) DESC

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT s.SubjID, u.LastName + u.FirstName AS CreatorName, s.DiscID, s.CreatedOn, s.CreatedBy, s.Title, d.DiscName, s.ReplyCount, s.Progress, d.DiscType, s.OrderPrice, s.ModifiedOn, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' ELSE s.ModifiedBy END AS ModifiedBy, CASE WHEN s.CreatedOn = s.ModifiedOn THEN '' ELSE mu.LastName + mu.FirstName END AS ModifierName, au.LastName + au.FirstName AS ApplyerName, s.ApplyCloseOn, s.CompID, s.PlanCloseOn, s.IsActive, s.ApplyCloseBy, d.isPublic, s.ClosedOn, s.CloseDays, s.ClosedBy, s.PlanDiff, s.sURL,s.SubjTagId,s.CusTagId FROM dbo.Subject AS s INNER JOIN dbo.CompUser AS u ON s.CreatedBy = u.UserID AND s.CompID = u.CompID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CompUser AS mu ON s.ModifiedBy = mu.UserID AND s.CompID = mu.CompID INNER JOIN dbo.Discussion AS d ON s.DiscID = d.DiscID AND s.CompID = d.CompID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CompUser AS au ON s.ApplyCloseBy = au.UserID AND s.CompID = au.CompID
